name: api_responses
description: Generate realistic API response payloads for a product catalog API

fields.name: product_id
fields.description: Product ID in format PROD-XXXX (4 digits)

fields.name: category
fields.description: Product category: electronics, clothing, home, sports, books

fields.name: stock_count
fields.description: Number of units in stock (0 if not in_stock)

fields.name: rating
fields.description: Average rating from 1.0 to 5.0, one decimal place

example.name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
example.description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.
